short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds size filters to Google Image Search (2MP-70MP) + auto photo size display.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension that adds a "Size" button that controls the image search size your your google content. 2MP -70MP

Allowing the user, creatives, and designers to navigate high quality image assets quickly.

Additional creative asset support at https://www.sesohq.com
